mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_info (mi_id, mi_pwd, mi_name, mi_email, mi_gen, mi_phone, mi_birth_year, mi_birth_m, mi_birth_d) VALUES (#{mi_id}, #{mi_pwd}, #{mi_name}, #{mi_email}, #{mi_gen}, #{mi_phone}, #{mi_birth_year}, #{mi_birth_m}, #{mi_birth_d});
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_info where mi_id=#{id}
select count(*) from member_info where mi_email=#{email}
select count(*) from member_info where mi_id=#{id} and mi_pwd=#{pwd}
